spec_data.Name: libdvdread
spec_data.Description:
libdvdread provides a simple foundation for reading DVD video disks.
It provides the functionality that is required to access many DVDs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 12 Aug 2017 11:31:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A library for reading DVD video discs based on Ogle code
